summary: The module offers tools for managing project documentation: a command‑line utility that scans documentation files, loads their content, and leverages an LLM (OpenAI chat models) to automatically refine or correct the text; and a set of helpers that locate Jupyter notebooks, convert them to Markdown, and handle directory validation and file‑modification timestamps.
business_intent: Enable teams to keep their documentation up‑to‑date and high‑quality with minimal manual effort by automatically improving existing docs and converting notebook content into a publishable markdown format.
